name: STARCH EUROPE
goal: Starch Europe's mission is to promote and protect the interests of EU starch producers to EU and international institutions and stakeholders, in order to assure a reliable and sustainable supply of safe starch based ingredients in a fair competitive environment.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives:
Environmental policy
Trade policy
Health policy
Agriculture Policy
Industrial policy
